body:
Hello again,

I tried to use idf file created by DesignBuilder and imported that idf file to HB. The geometry is imported much nicer and cleaner. However, energyplus simulation crashes in HB. 

When I use "find Adjacency" tool, it fails and I am not pretty sure why.

Would you please tell me if I can make this clean file work or should I give up on importing idf from Revit totally?



Thanks
